text: Adoniya, a Devit ko Hagitɨn otarim. Hagit Apsalom bategha, an gɨrara Adoniya bate. Adoniyan ganganiba bar dera, ezɨ an afeziam bar fomɨra iza datɨrɨghɨn, dughiatamɨn tong an arazir kuratam bagha an azangsɨgha kamaghɨn a mɨkemezir puvatɨ, “Nɨ manmaghsua arazir kabagh ami?” Egha datɨrɨghɨn Adoniya uabɨ, uabɨ fa ghaze, an atrivimɨn otivam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a mɨdorozir karisba ko hoziaba ko 50plan gumazir a geghuv an faragh mangamiba ini.
